author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Cutting tiles around plumbing can be tough. I use a test cap to transfer the toilet riser pipe location to the hexagon tile. Then I use a grinder with a diamond blade to cut the shape. The chamfer cone helps refine and polish. You can learn how to install a hexagon floor with my complete course at homerepairtutor.com
title: Hexagon Tile Floor Cutting Tips - #shorts #tilefloor #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
